stories.text:
Would you use a platform to build the tech backend of your MVP?

I'm building something that has built-in no-code API builder, auto scalable servers, flexible DB and a multi-language support code editor.

Building MVPs backend shouldn't take more than 1 day, and you can focus on building necessary UI to ship your MVP.

What would be your concerns for not using it?
stories.title: Ask HN: A platform to build back end of your MVP
